hint_dont_know_what_to_input: Don't know what to input? Try:
circle_intro_content_1: Think of a Circle like an apartment building with its own mailroom, storage rooms, and security. Everything you need is in one place, completely separate from other buildings.
circle_intro_content_2: Each Circle has its own locked vault for your messages and photos. When you switch circles, you switch vaults - keeping everything private and organized.
circle_intro_content_3: XChat only talks to your Circle's mailroom. No secret connections, no hidden doors. If anything unusual happens, we'll tell you immediately.
circle_intro_feature_1_desc: Each circle is like a separate apartment building - complete with its own mailroom and storage
circle_intro_feature_2_desc: Each circle has its own locked vault - your messages stay separate and secure
circle_intro_feature_3_desc: We only connect to your circle's mailroom - you'll see exactly where we connect
circle_intro_feature_4_desc: Switch between circles like changing apartments - each one keeps its own stuff
circle_intro_how_step_2: 2. Or use a simple name (like '0xchat' or 'damus')
circle_intro_how_step_3: 3. The app will connect and set up your private space
circle_intro_relay_answer: A relay is like a mailroom in your apartment building. It receives your sealed letters (messages), keeps them safe in mailboxes, and makes sure they get to your friends. The mailroom staff can't open your letters - they're sealed and encrypted. In XChat, each Circle uses one specific mailroom, so all your messages stay in one secure place.
circle_intro_faq_question_1: Can I use multiple mailrooms in one circle?
circle_intro_faq_answer_1:
No, each circle uses one mailroom. This makes your messages:
1. More reliable (everything's in one place)
2. More private (fewer connections = more secure)
circle_intro_faq_answer_2: Yes, go to Settings ‚Üí Circle Settings ‚Üí tap the menu (...) in the top right. Warning: This permanently deletes all messages and photos in that circle's vault - like demolishing the building. This can't be undone.
circle_intro_note: Remember: Each Circle is like a separate building. Your friends and messages in one circle won't show up in another - they each have their own locked vault.
switch_circle_dialog_content: This user is from circle "${name}" (${relayUrl}). Would you like to switch to this circle to chat with them?
join_circle_dialog_content: This user is from circle "${relay}". Would you like to join this circle to chat with them?
